args.content:
import Mathlib

/-
Let z : ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z| / (1 - |z|).
-/

theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_19502 (z : Complex) (h : |z| < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, |z| ^ n = |z| / (1 - |z|) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Let z : ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z| / (1 - |z|).
-/

theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_19502 {z : ℂ} (h : |z| < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, |z| ^ (n + 1) = |z| / (1 - |z|) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Let z : ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z| / (1 - |z|).
-/

theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_19502 (z : Complex) (h : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, (Complex.abs z) ^ (n + 1) = Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry
